title: Worked Solution
text:
$$100$$ $$ rac{km}{h}$$ is equivalent to $$27.8$$ $$ rac{m}{s}$$.
To convert, we can use the formula:
meters per second $$=$$ (kilometers per hour × 1000) ÷ $$3600$$
So for $$100$$ $$ rac{km}{h}$$:
meters per second $$=$$ (100 × 1000) ÷ $$3600$$ $$=$$ $$277.8$$ ÷ $$10$$ $$=$$ $$27.8$$ $$ rac{m}{s}$$
